scripts.local: browserify -p [ css-modulesify -o public/bundle.css ] main.js -o public/bundle.js && http-server
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && browserify -p [ css-modulesify -o public/bundle.css ] main.js -t envify -o public/bundle.js && node index.js
scripts.devw: set NODE_ENV=development& browserify -p [ css-modulesify -o public/bundle.css ] main.js -t envify -o public/bundle.js & node index.js
scripts.test: . /root/.bashrc && export APP_GASERV_HOST=${DOCKER_HOST_IP} && export NODE_ENV=testing && browserify -p [ css-modulesify -o public/bundle.css ] main.js -t envify -o public/bundle.js && node index.js
